EXPERIENCE_BANNER.TITLE: More than 30 years of experience offering flexible packaging solutions

FORM.TITLE: Are you interested in this product?
FORM.SUBTITLE: We will contact you soon

US.TITLE: About us
US.DES1: Polietileno Publicitario S.A. was born in 1986 out of the need to create a new company that could fully satisfy the demand for polyethylene bags and films for the Southeast Mexican market.
US.DES2: Its founder, Don Joaquín López Peniche, who for years had already manufactured bags in a family business, "Peniche Propaganda", decided to start this new company to specialize in the manufacture of high quality flexible packaging.
US.DES3: Today we manufacture pouch-sealed bags, monolayer and coextruded films of polyethylene in high and low density and polypropylene. We also make laminations for packaging applications that require an environmental barrier and, in addition, we have the highest technology in flexographic printing, which allows us to print in high definition up to 8 inks.
US.DES4: Throughout these 30 years we have grown to become the most modern and important polyethylene factory in the region.

1.TITLE: Excellence
1.CONTENT: We seek perfection in our being and acting.

2.TITLE: Loyalty
2.CONTENT: Proud to belong to the Polpusa family

5.TITLE: Integrity
5.CONTENT: We are faithful to our principles and values:

1.TITLE: Customers
1.DES: Consolidate our leadership at the national level in the manufacturing and innovation of flexible packaging, incorporating cutting-edge technology, delivering the highest quality materials, images and finishes on time, and with the most competent human capital in our industry.

2.TITLE: Suppliers
2.DES: Develop lasting and strategic relationships based on mutual benefit

3.TITLE: Collaborators
3.DES: Attract the best talent promoting the integral growth of our collaborators, offering opportunities and a worthy work environment.

4.TITLE: Community
4.DES: Actively participate in the development of our community, especially with the most vulnerable groups.

5.TITLE: Environment
5.DES: Develop sustainable products and operations and promote the care of our environment.
